i don't bring anything up to people
but i don't try to hide anything
if someone asks, i will answer

[bq="Albus Fahrenheits"]Anyone here a Closet Brony? Only Ivy knows I watch this show.[/bq]

I've gone out on several occasions with my pony shirt on and my friends and family are aware.
topics.author: 4fe4bf947f123b175b000001

topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54110d3263687260517f0100#post_54110d3263687260517f0100
I want to write a short story about a domesticate werewolf who wakes up in the morning embarrassed that they chased down people and viciously licked them in a friendly fashion, or even worse played fetch with them.

I want to write a story about Satan selling his soul to a record company for pop stardom.

I want to write an apocalyptic novel where society is crumbling due to weird fetishy things.

A series about the dark secrets of a small town which hides the war between inhuman gods.

The rise of a corporate climber from executive to primal goddess of the hunt.

An Elvis impersonator finds himself fighting to become king of the underworld and leading an army of rockabilly zombies.

A conspiracy thriller about derpibooru.

I could go on, but I think you get the idea.
topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7

topics.body:
"@gasmaskangel":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54110e7f6368720b50be0100#post_54110e7f6368720b50be0100

All those sound like awesome B-Movies

topics.body:
I make references to the show when I talk to people but they can never tell. I've built up an image of a religious, disciplined, learned tin soldier and Ponies wouldn't belong to someone like that. It's a secret I only tell to the people I truly trust.
